description:
The practice game against Keijo High, one of Kanagawa`s top four teams, begins. Iwashizumi faces off against Miyuki Atsushi, the friend he injured during middle school. Will Gion`s words reach Iwashizumi`s soul as he`s unable to wholeheartedly take on his old friend? As the fierce battle rages on, Sekizan`s unparalleled determination to win leads him to tackle his rival Taira Tadakazu...!
Source: crunchyroll
